Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hilton Los Angeles Airport in Los Angeles, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Automobile Driving Museum and Toyota Sports Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Hollywood Park Racetrack and Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Cable programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Cable programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers.

When you stay at Hilton Los Angeles Airport in Los Angeles, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Automobile Driving Museum and Toyota Sports Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Hollywood Park Racetrack and Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Automobile Driving Museum - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Toyota Sports Center - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Hollywood Park Racetrack - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Hollywood Park Casino - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Los Angeles Forum - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Lakes at El Segundo - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Loyola Marymount University - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Old Town Music Hall - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Westfield Culver City Shopping Center - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Polliwog Park - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Fisherman's Village - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Manhattan Beach Pier - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Sony Pictures Studios - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Venice Fishing Pier - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Los Angeles Airport is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Standard Room + Free Airport Transfer

Message.Text:
Room 1:

2 BEDS IS ON A REQUEST BASIS. NON SMOKING HOTEL. BED TYPE IS NOT GUARANTEED. ADDITIONAL CHARGE FOR. ROLLAWAY BED $35+TAX PER NIGHT. UNTIL 6/3/18 FRONT DRIVE & EXTERIOR RENOVATIONS.

RoomType.text: Double Standard Room + Free Airport Transfer

Message.Text:
Room 1
Important Information: Please note a minimum age requirement applies to most US hotels. In many hotels the primary guest must be at least 21 years of age on the day of check-in. For some hotels the minimum age is 18. Upon check-in photo ID may be required. You may contact our call centre prior to booking to confirm whether restrictions apply.

Resort Fee: Unless otherwise stated hotels may charge a resort fee payable directly to the hotel by the guest.

Essential Information:
Please note: An early departure fee of $50.00 applies. Self Parking $34.00+9.5% tax Valet $43.00+9.5% tax per day. Rollaway Bed is $35.00+15.6% tax per day, subject to availability on request. Under 5 children eat for free when accompanied by a parent. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Twin Runway View Room

RoomType.text: Double Standard Room + Free Airport Transfer

Message.Text: Note: *There is a fee for early departures* *We have one final Marble Replacement in front of the guest elevators and then we can finally say we have finished the marble project. For three days, beginning March 26, 2018-March 28, 2018 between the hours of 9:00AM-4:30PM we will have sporadic drilling noise. The installment of this new marble will be completed March 28, 2018.
